txt.en: You have turned in a stack of trophies for a modest reward suitable for a collector such as yourself.
Wanted: broken short bows from the Orcs, Angmarim, and evil Earth-kin south and east of Esteldín. Deliver the items to Ferrif within Esteldín.
'We can fashion these bows back into something that will assist us in this fight. Thank you.'
'Gather the weapons from the enemies to the east and south and return them to us.'
Rangers of Esteldín Task: Broken Short Bows
Ferrif, a Ranger, has asked for a collection of broken short bows to be delivered to him at the Ranger's home at Esteldín.
Deliver the broken short bows to Ferrif in Esteldín

You have accepted a task to collect broken short bows from the Orcs, Angmarim, and Earth-kin in the area surrounding Esteldín to the south and east. Once collected, you are to deliver the items to Ferrif within Esteldín.
Wanted: broken short bows from the Orcs, Angmarim, and evil Earth-kin south and east of Esteldín.
